[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA crab-like monster that boasts a giant set of pincers and a rigid shell. There is something endearing about the way it lurks in the sand, patiently waiting for its prey.

[Magic] Area attack.\nA manta ray-like monster that skillfully hunts using supersonic waves\nemitted from the stone on its head.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA large boar enveloped by an armor of tough leaves that are painful to the touch. However, its armor is still just leaves. It is weak against magic.

[Physical] Short-ranged attack.
Surrounded by an armor of sand, proof of a warrior
that is not afraid to throw away its life.
However, its armor is still just sand. It is weak against magic.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA massive boar that roams the hotlands. Stubbornly attacking magma rocks has honed its tusks to penetrate any armor.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nAn ancient automaton designed to support Ikt Galadion. With no will of its own, it fights relentlessly until its mechanisms are entirely demolished.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA young but fierce apprentice goblin. Makes up for its lack of physical strength by darting wildly about on the front lines.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA poison-tongued toad monster that disguises itself as a precious stone and consumes anyone greedy enough to approach.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA poison-tongued toad monster that disguises itself as a precious stone and consumes anyone greedy enough to approach.
[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.\nAn unusual snake monster that leaps from the shadows to feed on its prey's magical energy. Prefers to target beings with great magical power.
[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.\nTaking the spear of a drowned knight,\nthis seahorse-like warrior protects its territory.
[Magic] Mid-ranged attack.\nA bird-like monster that attacks with\nice-clad tail feathers.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA fish monster that hollows out glaciers to form its nest, and assaults any creature foolish enough to approach.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA fish monster that uses its powerful jaw, capable of crushing rocks, to consume anything and everything in sight.
[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.\nA snake-like monster that digs a hole and waits for prey,\nkilling victims with its poisonous bite.
[Physical] A ferocious dog created by human experimentation alongside its master. The terrifying expression on its face is the result of struggling to support its own large head.

[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.\nAn anchor-headed squid-like monster. Though its metal anchor is tough, it is also heavy, often causing the creature to lose its balance and collapse.

[Physical] Mid-ranged attack.\nA beaver that tears down any and all trees it can get its teeth into. It uses the resulting carvings not only to build its house, but also as projectile weapons.
[Healing] Single-target TP recovery.\nAn energy amplifier created alongside the Tower of Luna itself. By condensing the latent magical energy in its environment, it strengthens the tower's guardians.
[Physical] Short-ranged attack.\nA loyal demonic servant. Very fond of the golden armor its one-eyed lord bestowed upon it.
[Physical] The fully grown form of the diminutive Monkey King. Its muscular arms, honed from years of throwing large rocks, deal formidable blows to its enemies.

A peculiar monster bearing a striking resemblance to Hiyori.

- Deals large physical damage to an enemy directly in front and deals moderate physical damage to all enemies in a small radius around it.
- Deals moderate physical damage to an enemy directly in front.
- Deals small physical damage to an enemy directly in front. Boosts own physical attack by a moderate amount.

A peculiar monster bearing a striking resemblance to Rei (New Year).

- Deals moderate physical damage to all enemies and inflicts Stun.
- [Taunt] Taunts all enemies and enters a stance. If attacked during this stance, deals moderate physical damage to all enemies in range and lowers their physical defense by a small amount.
- Deploys a barrier that negates magical damage around all nearby allies. Moderate boost to own magical defense.

A peculiar monster bearing a striking resemblance to Yui (New Year).

- Grants HP regen and a barrier that negates physical and magical damage to all allies, but lowers own magical attack by a large amount.
- Lowers the physical and magical attack of the 2nd closest enemy by a large amount.
- Large boost to the magical attack of all allies that use magical attacks.
[Magic] Mid-ranged attack.\nAn owl monster that always seems to have thick bags under its eyes. Its bleary gaze has the power to stop enemies in their tracks.
[Magic] Temporary invincibility / Mid-ranged attack.\nThough still young, this raccoon dog monster is accomplished in both offense and defense thanks to its transformation skills.

- Deals massive physical damage to an enemy directly in front and inflicts Stun.

- Deals moderate physical damage to an enemy directly in front. Small boost to own physical attack.

[Physical] The Starbeast of Taurus, lurking deep within its labyrinthine lair. With its massive battleaxe, it slays all adventurers who dare approach.

- Deals large physical damage to all enemies and inflicts Burn.
- Deals large physical damage to an enemy, knocks them back, and inflicts Stun.
- Deals moderate magical damage to enemies in range and inflicts Paralyze.

[Physical] The Starbeast of Taurus, now imbued with still greater power. With its massive battleaxe, it slays all adventurers who dare approach.

- Deals large physical damage to all enemies and inflicts Burn.
- Deals large physical damage to an enemy, knocks them back, and inflicts Stun.
- Deals moderate magical damage to enemies in range and inflicts Paralyze.
- Large boost to own physical and magical attack, and deals large physical damage to the enemies in first and second position. After using this skill, Minotaurus's own physical and magical defense are lowered by a large amount.

[Physical] The Starbeast of Taurus, now imbued with still greater power. One blow from its boundlessly powerful battle-axe destroys all.

- Deals large physical damage to all enemies and inflicts Burn.
- Deals large physical damage to the enemy with the highest magical attack, knocks them back, and inflicts Stun. This skill's status effects are applied even if the damage is blocked.
- Deals moderate magic damage to 3 enemies in front and inflicts Paralyze.
- Boosts own physical and magical attack by a large amount, and deals large physical damage to the 2 closest enemies. After using this skill, lowers own physical and magical defense by a large amount.
- Removes all enemies' stat buffs and activates a Battlefield Event.

[Battlefield Event]
The entire field is engulfed in flames and the following effects are activated:
- Lowers all allies' physical and magical attack by 100%. After that, boosts their physical and magical attack by a massive amount.
- Lowers Minotaurus's physical attack by 100%. After that, boosts its physical attack by a massive amount.

The Starbeast of Scorpio, raining calamity upon the world with
its venomous stinger. Once a guardian deity of the desert,
it turned to evil after its worshippers abandoned it.

- Deals large physical damage to all enemies.
Each time this boss uses its Union Burst, the damage dealt
increases. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
- Deals moderate physical damage to enemies in range and
inflicts Poison.
- Nullifies stat debuffs on self and boosts own physical defense.

[Physical] The Starbeast of Scorpio, left alone in an abandoned temple. Forgetting the pious worship it once enjoyed, it devotes itself to destruction.

- Deals large physical damage to all enemies. After using this skill, Lesathapult's damage to each enemy increases with each attack. This effect stacks up to three times.
- Deals moderate physical damage to a small area around the enemy in front and inflicts Poison.
- Nullifies stat debuffs on self and boosts own physical defense.

The Starbeast of Capricorn, plotting to conquer the world with its twisted cult. Performs demonic rituals to enslave travelers lost in the desert.

- Deals massive magic damage to the enemy with the highest physical attack and reduces their TP.
- Deals small magic damage to 2 enemies in front and inflicts Silence, then deals additional moderate magic damage to all enemies.

- When the main body is broken, Agitated Ueki-chan's physical and magical defense are lowered by a large amount.
- When Agitated Ueki-chan's own HP falls below 40%, its attacks become even more intense.

[MODE 1] A mysterious being, now grown to incredible size. Still fixing our heroes with its indescribable gaze, it soaks the ground in a waterfall of tears that passively erode their defenses.

- Union Burst: Deals large magical damage to all enemies and lowers their physical and magical defense.
- Recovers all enemies' TP, then deploys a field that deals magical damage over time.
- The leaves on either side of its body disappear for a set time when broken.
- When each of the leaves is broken, Agitated Ueki-chan's physical and magical defense are lowered by a small amount.
- When the main body is broken, Agitated Ueki-chan's physical and magical defense are lowered by a large amount.

[MODE 2] Perhaps daunted by our heroes' resistance, the mysterious being stands defenseless, its great leaves and trunk open to attack. Yet even now, that indescribable gaze never once leaves its face.

- All targets are immune to being broken.
- Union Burst: Deals large magical damage to all enemies and lowers their physical and magical defense.
- Deals physical damage to enemies in range and knocks them back.
- Summons a Kyukon-chan. Kyukon-chan cannot be targeted by attacks, and self-destructs after a set time, dealing magical damage to enemies in range.

[MODE 3] As that indescribable gaze remains implacable, our heroes are struck with fear at the madness their foe embodies. Will the mysteries of this strange being ever be solved...?

- Union Burst: Deals large magical damage to all enemies and lowers their physical and magical defense.
- Deals physical damage to enemies in range and knocks them back.
- Summons a Kyukon-chan. Kyukon-chan cannot be targeted by attacks, and self-destructs after a set time, dealing magical damage to enemies in range.
- The leaves on either side of its body disappear for a set time when broken.
- When each of the leaves is broken, Agitated Ueki-chan's physical and magical defense are lowered by a small amount.
- When the main body is broken, Agitated Ueki-chan's physical and magical defense are lowered by a large amount.

[Physical] A metal monstrosity created from innovative concepts and misguided passion. Utilizing its inspirations' talents in the most twisted fashion, it annihilates the self-esteem of all who approach it.

- If Friendbot X is inflicted with Poison, Venom or Curse, its physical and magical defense and action speed are reduced by a large amount.
- Union Burst: Deals percentage magical damage to all enemies based on their maximum HP.
- Boosts own physical attack, then deals physical damage to all enemies.
- Deals large magical damage to the third enemy from the front and lowers their magical defense and action speed.

 Deals small physical damage to the enemy with the greatest remaining HP.
